title: New lidar platforms promise safer, more efficient, and more autonomous industrial systems
description:
FMCW lidar offers mobile robots better precision for navigation at scale in complex environments, says Voyant Photonics' CEO.

The post New lidar platforms promise safer, more efficient, and more autonomous industrial systems appeared first on The Robot Report.
